Author: scarletfawn
Text: I feel you, I was in recovery for 9 months and after that went back to my bs (wouldn't call it a relapse tbh cause I never recovered) and lost most of the weight I gained. Then summer holidays started and I've had binge cycles straight from hell and gained so much weight and it makes me feel so invalid... If I have to summarize my summer mood it'd probably be "eating a loaf of bread while crying and looking at tumblr thinspo". I need to pull myself together ðŸ˜¶   EDs are so twisted because you won't feel sick if you don't look even tho it's a mental issue with possible physical side effects... I wish you the best with your recovery and hope you find the strength to change your life for the better even if it may seem hard right now, remember, you are valid, you are worthy of recovery ðŸ’—
